nodes.text: Voam was a village of the Evocii species near Jiguuna on Nal Hutta. The Hutt Suudaa Nem'ro operated a work camp out of the village.
The Evocii Morsel was an administrator at the camp. Var'soonta ran his business, Var'soonta's Many Treasures, out of the camp, assisted by his helper, Imot.
